statements: SELECT * FROM qualitative_research WHERE study_id = 1;
SELECT researcher_name, research_topic FROM qualitative_research WHERE observation_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM qualitative_research ORDER BY observation_date DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, COUNT(*) AS total_studies FROM qualitative_research GROUP BY researcher_name;
SELECT * FROM qualitative_research WHERE research_topic LIKE '%technology%';
SELECT * FROM qualitative_research WHERE study_id = 100;
SELECT researcher_name, observation_date FROM qualitative_research WHERE research_topic LIKE '%qualitative%';
SELECT * FROM qualitative_research WHERE observation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT study_id, researcher_name FROM qualitative_research ORDER BY observation_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(study_id) AS avg_study_id, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM qualitative_research GROUP BY researcher_name;
SELECT * FROM Qualitative_Researchers;
SELECT researcher_name, research_area FROM Qualitative_Researchers;
SELECT researcher_id, researcher_name, research_area FROM Qualitative_Researchers WHERE researcher_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Relational_Data_Models;
SELECT model_name, model_description FROM Relational_Data_Models;
SELECT researcher_id, researcher_name, research_area FROM Qualitative_Researchers WHERE research_area = 'Sociology';
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_id, research_area FROM Qualitative_Researchers ORDER BY researcher_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Relational_Data_Models WHERE model_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY model_id;
SELECT model_name, model_description FROM Relational_Data_Models WHERE model_description LIKE '%conceptual%' ORDER BY model_name;
SELECT researcher_name, research_area FROM Qualitative_Researchers WHERE researcher_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY researcher_name;
SELECT researcher_id, researcher_name, research_field, research_topic FROM qualitative_researchers;
SELECT * FROM data_models;
SELECT model_name, model_version, model_description FROM data_models;
SELECT query_id, query_name, query_description FROM data_queries;
SELECT query_name, query_params FROM data_queries;
SELECT researcher_name, research_field, research_topic FROM qualitative_researchers WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT model_id, model_name, model_description, model_version FROM data_models WHERE model_id > 100 ORDER BY model_name DESC;
SELECT query_name, query_description FROM data_queries WHERE query_params ->> 'type' = 'complex' ORDER BY query_name ASC;
SELECT researcher_id, researcher_name FROM qualitative_researchers WHERE research_field = 'Social Sciences' AND research_topic LIKE '%behavior%';
SELECT query_id, query_name, query_description, query_params FROM data_queries WHERE query_params -> 'filters' @> '{"date_range": "2022-06-01 to 2022-06-30"}' ORDER BY query_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM researchers;
SELECT researcher_name, research_field FROM researchers WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT project_id, project_name, researcher_id FROM research_projects ORDER BY project_id DESC;
SELECT contributor_name, contribution_amount FROM project_contributors WHERE project_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM project_comments WHERE comment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM researchers;
SELECT researcher_name, research_field FROM researchers WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM research_projects WHERE project_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT DISTINCT contributor_name FROM project_contributors WHERE contribution_amount > 1000;
SELECT project_id, count(comment_id) AS total_comments FROM project_comments GROUP BY project_id;
SELECT * FROM researchers;
SELECT study_id, study_title FROM studies WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT participant_name, age FROM participants WHERE study_id = 3 ORDER BY participant_name DESC;
SELECT analysis_results FROM analysis WHERE study_id = 2;
SELECT data_id, data_values FROM data WHERE participant_id = 5;
SELECT researcher_name, research_interests FROM researchers WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT participant_name, age FROM participants WHERE study_id = 2 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT data_values ->> 'result' AS result FROM data WHERE study_id = 3 AND participant_id = 4;
SELECT study_title, researcher_name, analysis_results FROM studies JOIN researchers ON studies.researcher_id = researchers.researcher_id JOIN analysis ON studies.study_id = analysis.study_id;
SELECT DISTINCT study_title FROM studies WHERE study_title ILIKE '%machine learning%';
